TopicTitle: cupola doesnt count as a command pod?

Articles.Content:
i get has no remote control or manned command modules etc warning when trying to launch a ship with a man in the cupola.

is this correct or did i break something again?

Edit:nvm, jeb decided he wanted to sit in the science pod even though i told him to get in the cupola.

Edited May 12, 2018 by putnamto
Did you get it even after you put a Kerbal in there?
Try TakeCommand. It's a mod that would allow what you want.
